_comment: Biological tissue (human body) sediment layer properties
name: Biological Tissue
description: Biological tissue (human body) - viscoelastic material with weak reflection and strong absorption
_comment_sound_speed: Sound speed in layer, m/s (1450-1600 range, using average 1525)
_comment_attenuation: Attenuation coefficient at 1 kHz, dB/m (0.5-1.0 dB/m/kHz range, using average 0.75)
source: Typical values for biological tissue (human body) - very weak reflection from water, very strong absorption, SBP barely penetrates
